snippet: DICKSTEIN--Blanche, Died peacefully on May 29, 2016 at the age of 97. Married to her late beloved husband, Abner, for 47 years. Loving mother of Helene Sidel (Michael), Terry Miller (the late David), Nancy Gerber (Michael) and predeceased daughter Lois. Grandmother to Karen, Jennifer, Alexis, Amanda, Tiffany, and Austin. Great-grandmother to Jessica, Natalie, Sophie, Lily, Dylan, Zachary, Samuel, and Davida. To honor Blanche's memory, donations can be made to UJA Federation of New York City. Funeral services Wednesday, June 1, 2016 at 11:00am, Plaza Chapel, New York. 1/3
